description: Erection of new porch, single storey flat roof rear/side extensions with installtion of 2no rooflights and associated changes to fenestration. Erection of detached single storey outbuilding to be used as storage space.
decision_conditions: Development  shall  be  carried  out  in  accordance  with  the  materials  specified  on  the approved plans and on the application form unless otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority.Reason: To ensure a satisfactory appearance on completion of the development in accordance with Policy DM10 (Design Requirements for New Developments including House Extensions) of the LDF Core Strategy Adopted April 2012.
The development hereby permitted shall begin before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.Reason: This is required by Section 91 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990.

The flat roof(s) of the extensions and alterations hereby permitted shall not be converted or used as a balcony or a sitting out area, and no access shall be gained except for maintenance purposes.Reason: To protect the amenities and privacy of the adjoining residential properties in accordance with Policy DM10 (Design Requirements for New Developments including House Extensions) of the LDF Core Strategy Adopted April 2012.

The applicant is informed that the submitted details have been assessed by relevant consultants and are hereby approved subject to carrying out the development in accordance with the approved details, in relation to Condition 23 (Automated Gates) of planning permission 22/02051/FUL, which states:Condition 23 (Automated Gates) - Prior to the beneficial occupation of the development hereby approved details of the automated gates, including materials, construction details, and acoustic attenuation to ensure the amenities of occupants of neighbouring land and buildings is preserved whilst the gates are being used, shall have been submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority. The gate shall be installed, and maintained, in accordance with the approved details. Reason: To safeguard the amenities of the occupiers of the neighbouring properties and the visual amenities of the area in accordance with Policy DM10 (Design Requirements for New Developments including House Extensions) of the LDF Core Strategy Adopted April 2012.

We received only one existing side elevation, we require both (right and left) side elvations. Please provide all Existing Side Elevations at a recognised scale (at 1:50 or 1:100 for example), showing all elevations not just part and indicating all key dimensions for the proposed work. Although the inclusion of a scale bar is not mandatory, it is encouraged.
